p: Results: 86/14 comparators and 86/14 Pentaglobin-treated cases had severe sepsis/septic shock; 51 and 51 respectively were treated with inappropriate antimicrobials; respective mean Charlson Comordibity Index (CCI) was 2.86 and 2.67. 28-day mortality was 58 % and 39 % respectively (p = 0.011). Post-hoc analysis of subgroups is shown in Fig. 14.
